# RenderableComponentBase.UpdateValuesOnChangeOutFocus method

Method, which updates primitive value only, when element is out of focus. Public property IsFocus can be set. If is true, element won't be updated. IValueTag instance.

```csharp
public void UpdateValuesOnChangeOutFocus(OnlinerBase tag)
```
